duties_responsibilities.duty: Support delivery of parts to commercial customers and assist with task and inventory processes in the store.
Achieve sales and service objectives by supporting the DIY business with good knowledge of store systems, basic automotive system knowledge, and basic part knowledge.

Support advanced functions of the DIY business and provide expert knowledge of store systems, advanced automotive system knowledge, and the ability for advanced identification, trouble shooting, and project assistance for DIY customers.

Support advanced functions for both DIY and DIFM, providing expert knowledge of store systems, advanced automotive system knowledge, and the ability for advanced identification, trouble shooting, and project assistance for DIY/DIFM customers.

Responsible for supporting basic and advanced functions on DIY and professional business, maintaining company standards around operating and product processes, and preparing for a General Manager role.
